channel.title: How to change name of lunar spells from null [pi]
channel.description: Want to change the name of lunar spells that im using for teles on my server, but not sure how to, so the when you hover over it it says xxx teles instead of null

item.title: How to change name of lunar spells from null [pi]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

If I remember correctly the lunar spellbook stuff is changed client-sided because it’s ‘custom’ on 317s (I think) so you can’t do it server side by over-writing the previous stuff as with normal/ancient spells.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change name of lunar spells from null [pi]
